text: Sobaeksan (Sobaek Mountain) is a mountain of the Sobaek Mountains, in South Korea. It lies between Danyang County in the province of Chungcheongbuk-do and the city of Yeongju in the province of Gyeongsangbuk-do. It has an elevation of .Yu 2007, p.353. The Korea Astronomy and Space Science Institute operates an observatory on this mountain.Sobaeksan Optical Astronomy Observatory ==See also== * Sobaeksan National Park * List of mountains in Korea ==Notes== ==References== * Category:Mountains of South Korea Category:Mountains of North Chungcheong Province Category:Mountains of North Gyeongsang Province Category:Sobaek Mountains
title: Sobaeksan
